page.title: 14Children's Activities
page.content: Children's hobbies are many and include, BMX, Fishing,and Judo. Quite a lot of children take advantage of the facilities offered at the Leisurte Centre in Boroughbridge. Many of the girls belong to the Guides and Brownies. the boys have a similar organisation called the Boy Scouts. I go to Brownies on Monday night. we have three groups called Footpath, Roadway and Highway. I am in Highway where we work for badges like the Friendship badge. We also play games like'May I'. You play it like this, someone is on, they must call out someone else, who must then do what the person who is on says. We aslo collect silver paper, stamps and kit kt wrappers for a guide dog for the blind. I like to knit and i am knitting some squares for the drought victims in Ethiopia.
